permissions: Admin users can create change requests; non-admin users can create change requests for organizations whose broker is in their membership scope (or when the organization has no broker).
side_effects: Creates a new change request record; server derives broker from organization when provided.
validation_notes: If --organization is provided, it must be Type|ID format (e.g., Broker|123). If using --organization-type or --organization-id, both must be provided together. When --requests is provided, it must be a JSON array of objects; use [] for empty. Server validates requests is an array of hashes and enforces that organization and broker match.

flags.name: --requests
flags.description: Request items as JSON array (use [] for empty)
flags.validation: Must be a JSON array of objects; empty string is invalid (use []).

flags.name: --organization
flags.validation: Must be in Type|ID format (e.g., Broker|123).

flags.name: --organization-type
flags.validation: Must be provided with --organization-id when used.

flags.name: --organization-id
flags.validation: Must be provided with --organization-type when used.
